document_data.name: Soluun Xibrindas
document_data.mainbody: '''Soluun Xibrindas''' ({{Pronounce|soh|LOON|_|zeh|BRIN|das|refs=}}) was one of the top agents of [[Bregan D'aerthe]] in [[Waterdeep]] during the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Soluun, together with [[Fel'rekt Lafeen]] and [[Krebbyg Masq'il'yr]], was tasked by [[Jarlaxle]] with carrying out dirty deeds in the city. At night, Soluun's hobby was killing solitary [[elves]] and [[half-elves]] in the [[Dock Ward of Waterdeep|Dock Ward]].
document_data.History: The family's house was destroyed and only Soluun and his younger brother [[Nar'l Xibrindas|Nar'l]] survived. They decided to join [[Bregan D'aerthe]].
document_data.Personality: Soluun was a fanatical bully totally loyal to Bregan D'aerthe and Jarlaxle. He considered his brother weak for his decision to study [[magic]]. From his earliest days, he hated surface elves and half-elves and when he had free time outside his missions Soluun always tried to kill some solitary elvish individuals.
document_data.Possessions: Like his fellows Fel'rekt and Krebbyg, Soluun was equipped with [[Lantanese]] [[firearm]]s.
